overview: Ever wonder how Shaun got his hard-core abs? Here's the secret--and the best part is you don't need to lie on the floor or use any gadgets. Shaun shows you how to dance your way to the rock hard abs of your dreams. What are you waiting for? Let's go! You'll be showering off your midsection before you know it.
tagline: Want to get a Rockin' Body?
title: Rockin' Body: Hard-Core Abs
